svg.desc:
Reworked Coffee Cup Animation by yamachem http://openclipart.org/detail/224843/morphingcoffeesmilanimation Used script to modify Bezier curves instead of using SMIL animation
by Jay Nick steamcoded.org

path.style: stroke-width: 30px; stroke-linecap: round; fill: rgba(66, 148, 247, 0); stroke: rgb(216, 188, 0);
stroke-width: 30px; stroke-linecap: round; fill: rgba(66, 148, 247, 0); stroke: rgb(216, 188, 0);
